00037 
00038 // Netscape portable runtime
00039 #    if defined(USE_NSPR_THREADS)
00040 #        include "sys/ThreadNSPR.h"
00041 namespace sys
00042 {
00043 typedef ThreadNSPR Thread;
00044 }
00045 // If they explicitly want posix
00046 #    elif defined(__POSIX)
00047 #        include "sys/ThreadPosix.h"
00048 namespace sys
00049 {
00050 typedef ThreadPosix Thread;
00051 }
00052 #    elif defined(WIN32)
00053 #        include "sys/ThreadWin32.h"
00054 namespace sys
00055 {
00056 typedef ThreadWin32 Thread;
00057 }
00058 #    elif defined(__sun) && !defined(__POSIX)
00059 #        include "sys/ThreadSolaris.h"
00060 namespace sys
00061 {
00062 typedef ThreadSolaris Thread;
00063 }
00064 #    elif defined(__sgi) && !defined(__POSIX)
00065 #        include "sys/ThreadIrix.h"
00066 namespace sys
00067 {
00068 typedef ThreadIrix Thread;
00069 }
00070 // If they havent defined anything and its !windows, we'll give 'em posix
00071 #    else
00072 #        include "sys/ThreadPosix.h"
00073 namespace sys
00074 {
00075 typedef ThreadPosix Thread;
00076 }
00077 #    endif // Which thread package?
00078 
00079 #  endif // Are we reentrant?
